    • Uses of IndependentProbDistribution in opendial

      Methods in opendial that return IndependentProbDistribution 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      IndependentProbDistribution DialogueSystem.getContent(java.util.Collection<java.lang.String> variables)
      Returns the probability distribution associated with the variables in the current dialogue state.
      IndependentProbDistribution DialogueSystem.getContent(java.lang.String... variables)
      Returns the probability distribution associated with the variables in the current dialogue state.
      Methods in opendial with parameters of type IndependentProbDistribution 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void DialogueSystem.addContent(IndependentProbDistribution distrib)
      Adds the content (expressed as a categorical table over variables) to the current dialogue state, and subsequently updates the dialogue state.

      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      IndependentProbDistribution IndependentProbDistribution.copy()
      Returns a copy of the distribution.
      IndependentProbDistribution ProbDistribution.getPosterior(Assignment condition)
      Returns the probability table for the head variables, given the conditional assignment given as argument.

    • Uses of IndependentProbDistribution in opendial.bn.distribs.continuous

      Classes in opendial.bn.distribs.continuous that implement IndependentProbDistribution 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  ContinuousDistribution
      Representation of a continuous probability distribution, defined by an arbitrary density function over a single (univariate or multivariate) variable.

    • Uses of IndependentProbDistribution in opendial.bn.distribs.discrete

      Classes in opendial.bn.distribs.discrete that implement IndependentProbDistribution 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  CategoricalTable
      Simple probability distribution represented as a probability table.

    • Uses of IndependentProbDistribution in opendial.bn.distribs.incremental

      Classes in opendial.bn.distribs.incremental that implement IndependentProbDistribution 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  IncrementalDistribution
      Representation of an incremental distribution -- that is, an distribution that is built up of a connected graph of smaller units that can be incrementally inserted or modified at runtime.

    • Uses of IndependentProbDistribution in opendial.bn.distribs.other

      Classes in opendial.bn.distribs.other with type parameters of type IndependentProbDistribution 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  ConditionalDistribution<T extends IndependentProbDistribution>
      Conditional probability distribution represented as a probability table.
      Classes in opendial.bn.distribs.other that implement IndependentProbDistribution 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  EmpiricalDistribution
      Distribution defined "empirically" in terms of a set of samples on the relevant variables.
      Methods in opendial.bn.distribs.other that return IndependentProbDistribution 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      IndependentProbDistribution MarginalEmpiricalDistribution.getPosterior(Assignment condition)
      Returns the posterior distribution associated with the empirical distribution given the conditional assignment provided as argument.

    • Uses of IndependentProbDistribution in opendial.inference

      Methods in opendial.inference that return IndependentProbDistribution 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      IndependentProbDistribution InferenceAlgorithm.queryProb(ProbQuery query)
      Computes the probability distribution for the query variables given the provided evidence, all specified in the query
      IndependentProbDistribution SwitchingAlgorithm.queryProb(ProbQuery query)
      Selects the best algorithm for performing the inference on the provided probability query and return its result.

    • Uses of IndependentProbDistribution in opendial.state

      Methods in opendial.state that return IndependentProbDistribution 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      IndependentProbDistribution DialogueState.queryProb(java.util.Collection<java.lang.String> variables)
      Returns the probability distribution corresponding to the values of the state variables provided as argument.

      Returns the probability distribution corresponding to the values of the state variables provided as argument.
      Methods in opendial.state with parameters of type IndependentProbDistribution 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void DialogueState.addToState(IndependentProbDistribution distrib)
      Adds the content provided as argument to the dialogue state.
